document.full_text: the latest installment of the "pirates of the caribbean" movie franchise laid anchor at the cannes film festival on saturday, bringing with it a crew of big stars including johnny depp and penelope cruz.
document.title: pirates of caribbean sail to cannes with star crew
lines_and_colors: the latest installment of the "pirates of the caribbean" movie franchise laid anchor at the cannes film festival on saturday, bringing with it a crew of big stars including johnny depp and penelope cruz.
